title: 4 Da 304's
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s the Dustin Ross takeover! We discuss open relationships and marriages. 

Black Business of the Week - Mandii B’s new women’s health subscription service https://www.officialboxowner.com

Wellness Segment:
Acure Clarifying Shampoo https://acure.com/curiously-clarifying-shampoo.html

Rizos Curls - https://rizoscurls.com

Curl Mix - https://www.curlmix.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:
NHTSA - Distracted driving is a serious problem on our roadways leading to the deaths of thousands of people and injuries in the hundreds of thousands each year. When you take your eyes and your focus off the road, even for a second, it can be deadly. Not just for you but for other drivers, pedestrians and bicyclists. Sadly, many Americans use their cell phones while driving. Whether it’s texting, checking emails, scrolling media feeds or any other form of distraction, drivers are putting themselves and others around them at great risk. It’s important to know that 48 states ban texting and driving. Also, 21 states prohibit all drivers from using cell phones while driving. Distracted drivers are not only putting people at risk; they’re also breaking the law. Remember U Drive. U Text. U Pay. Brought to you by NHTSA [NITS-uh]

Tushy - The Hello Tushy modern bidet attachment cleans your butt with a precise stream of fresh water for just SEVENTY-NINE DOLLARS. It attaches to your existing toilet - requires NO electricity or additional plumbing - and cuts toilet paper use by EIGHTY PERCENT - so the Hello Tushy bidet pays for itself in a few months. Because, with Hello Tushy, you don’t wipe at all. Ditch paper products and uncomfortable chafing when you switch to the soothing, cleansing stream of water from a Hello Tushy bidet attachment. AND every Hello Tushy bidet attachment comes with a SIXTY DAY RISK-FREE GUARANTEE and a TWELVE-MONTH WARRANTY. Go to https://hellotushy.com/FRIENDZONE to get 10% off.

Talkspace - Talkspace online therapy lets you connect with a licensed therapist for a fraction of the price of in-person therapy. Match with your perfect therapist from the comfort of your device and reach out 24/7, whenever something is on your mind. The Talkspace network is composed of thousands of licensed therapists who have experience in over forty specialties. The bottom line is that we all need someone to talk to. Talkspace wants to give us the support we deserve at a price we can afford. As a listener of this podcast, you get one-hundred dollars off your first month on Talkspace. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get one-hundred dollars off your first month and show your support for the show.

Fight Camp - If you’re looking for a workout that keeps you engaged, learning, excited, and motivated — a workout that’s never boring — you’ve got to check out Fight Camp! FightCamp brings the boxing gym to your living room. They provide all the gear and top trainers. You get to learn from six highly qualified trainers ranging from a pro MMA fighter and mother of two to a kickboxing world champion. No problem if you’re new to boxing. Their 12-week starter program teaches you the fundamentals of boxing while you get a great workout every time. And there are 400 different workouts — it’s even great for kids. FightCamp offers flexible financing for as low as 0% APR! And right now as a limited time offer, you can try FightCamp for 30 days with their money-back guarantee, just go to https://joinfightcamp.com/ZONE.

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT day!
